name: Proto - BoxedZombies
description: IT IS 205X AND HUMANITY IS ALMOST DECIMATED BY A STRANGE VIRUS THAT BRINGS THE DEAD BACK TO LIFE. POWERFUL GROUPS OF PEOPLE HAVE TAKEN CONTROL AND TREAT THE WEAK AS SLAVES YOU ARE ONE OF THOSE DESPAIRADOS WHO ARE SENT TO DIE IN THE ZOMBIE ARENA TO ENTERTAIN THE POWERFULS SURVIVE THE ZOMBIES AND TAKE REVENGE ON YOUR TORTURERS.
